valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 5 Jan 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 6 Jan 2026
general_synopsis: Low Shannon 1014 expected Biscay 1010 by 1800 Monday. Low Forties 1000 expected German Bight 1007 by same time. New lows expected Viking 1009 and Southeast Iceland 1011 by that time
